page.title: 01GAZETTEER-BLOCK 03920396
page.content: Block 03920396 is situated in Tameside,which is one of the Local Authorities of Greater Manchester, and includes sections of Ashton,Audenshaw, Dukinfield,Guide Bridge and Newton. The residents (including several immigrant communities) live in an area which has Victorian public buildings, inner-city housing and typical suburban areas,as well as modern facilities for shopping,housing and recreation. Some manufacturing industry is located in factories previously built for the textile trade,but recent developments include modern industrial estates. Evidence of industrial decline can be seen alongside the railway lines and canals which pass through the block. Plans for a Canal Museum/Heritage Centre in Ashton reflect the desire for leisure/recreational facilities.
